author: CT Phipps
description:
It: Welcome to Derry was a work I was decidedly suspicious of. With rare exceptions like Fallout and HBO’s Watchmen, I have the general view that works expanding on an author’s property without the author’s involvement tend to flop hard. I enjoyed IT: Part One and IT: Part Two, even more than the original miniseries, […]

The post REVIEW: IT: Welcome to Derry appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: IT: Welcome to Derry
